name: Paul Beasly
description: I enjoy a variety of things. I am a 49 years old sports fan man from Utah. I have brown eyes and black hair, my body is athletic, and I live alone. I have children, and sometimes they live at home I’m single, white / caucasian, but I like the funny woman. I’m looking for you, if you are a hetero, single and clever girl, who likes athletic man. Come with me!
